name: Mega Evolution Creation
text:
### Benefits of Mega Evolution:
- 3 Stat cap points may be shifted to other stats
- 7 Stat cap increases atop your base stats
- Your base stats for this form are calculated from your new final stat caps, then you get to spend your level based stat points into them.
- Mono types may add a second type/Dual types may change one of their types, including the deletion of one.
- Different/Custom ability.
- Visual appearane and size/weight changes.
- Add 3 moves fitting your mega evolution to your learnable movepool on acquisition (They still have to be bought/learned via TM).

### Requirements/Cost of Mega Evolution:
- Unlock level at 12
- Has to be unlocked by completing a very hard quest specifically to acquire your mega stone as your own primary reward of it.
- You carry your mega stone on your body in whatever way you deem fits. This could be integrated in you armor/weapon/shield/accessory (without taking a slot), or it could be a separate item entirely. How you carry it is purely for flavour purposes, it doesn't take up inventory space or your held item slot.
- Lasts for the entire quest when activated, start to finish (Even whon KOd and revived).
- GM determines how many are allowed within quest post.
- Does **NOT** prevent you from also using a Z-Move.
- There is **no cost** for having it active, except for taking up one of the allowed megas the GM permitted.

This has to be posted on <#1271585309595009074> for proper approval, can be started when your Char hits Level 11.
